mapper.update: update profile_outbox set title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, userid = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, touserids = #{touserids,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, fromtype = #{fromtype,jdbcType=INTEGER} where pkid = #{pkid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select pkid, title, userid, createtime, content, touserids,fromtype from profile_outbox
